title: Optimizing your webapp by using django-debug-toolbar
summary:
This talk explains how to perform SQL query analysis and how to rewrite
your views to reduce the number of queries Django uses in evaluating
your model objects and their attributes. Special emphasis will be given
to the powerful methods "select\_related" and "prefetch\_related." I
will highlight the problem with a naive use of the ORM, how to target
code for optimization, and the beneficial result.

Help us caption & translate this video!
